overview: In 1921, Titanus released a three-part serial based on a popular Italian novel from the turn of the 20th century: Nobodyâ€™s Children by Ruggero Rindi. The tale of lovers thwarted by class differences, of illegitimate children and parental recognition denied was a major success for producer Gustavo Lombardo and leading lady Leda Gys.
title: Nobody's Children
